name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【福岡サンパレス】 [ysmbvtf3_bc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow of handwritten messages from fans wishing Hoshimachi Suisei luck on her 'Spectra of Nova' live tour.
An 'Attention' screen displaying venue rules and etiquette for attendees.
A showcase of limited-edition merchandise for the 'Spectra of Nova' live tour.
Continuation of fan messages slideshow with a change in background music.
Pre-show waiting screen with key visual illustration and 'starting soon' message.
Sponsor credits screen featuring JOYSOUND and Fukuya.

subtitles.english:
Attention: To all attendees
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is OK.
